flawed_nl_solution:
You first have to calculate the total mass of apples he had on the shelves, so you add the three kinds of apples: 23 kg + 37 kg + 14 kg = <<23+37+14=74>>74kg
Since he sold 36 kg of apples, he still has: 74 kg - 36 kg = <<74-36=37>>37kg
#### 37

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 38, not 37. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
